bibl.title: A Fragment of a Letter from a Bishop to a Scholastikos.
bibl.note: Letter from the Bishop Phoibammon [perhaps Apa Phoibammon, episkopos of the polis of Shmin (i.e. Panopolis) and protégé of the Patriarch Theodosios I (535-66)] to a scholastikos named Gerontios, concerning the carving of a persea-wood door. Provenance unknown, 6th century.
HICKEY Todd M., A Fragment of a Letter from a Bishop to a Scholastikos.
